website_summaries.verdict: A powerful, competitively priced model that is highly rated by owners.
pros: Full range of functions with starting range of up to 1,000 feet
cons: Good knowledge of vehicle wiring needed

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son's 94 Silverado. Since it was an older vehicle I didn't need an emobilizer bypass and was easy to install. Remote starts works perfect! I did have to wire up 2 relays for the door locks to reverse polarity but other then that it was very easy. I do wish the manual gave better instruction on how to program the remote. Overall very happy, this was my first time installing one of these so I suggest you do some research if it's yours as well for wiring, don't assume any diagram is correct and test the wires with a multimeter first.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Compustar is the best
customer_reviews.text: I have compustar remote starts in all my vehicles and would never put any other brand in. Living in alaska this is a necessity, not just a nice option and compustar will not let you down. Install is easy if you are familiar with electrical circuitry and alarm wiring. However, If you have never installed an alarm or remote start before I would definitely urge you to have it professionally installed though.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Paradiso

customer_reviews.title: Flawless
customer_reviews.text: Installed using supplied instructions. Works FLAWLESSLY! I'm not a professional installer, but I do have a basic knowledge of 12 circuits.
customer_reviews.author: Bawse

customer_reviews.title: Did not work with Toyota Rav 4 2018
customer_reviews.text: An auto technician could not install it, he tried it for hours and the vehicle will not start successfully, heard the sound to start the vehicle for a couple seconds and shut offs immediately . Technical support over the phone told different instructions than what was written on its own manual, but still no solution. We use a DB3 universal bypass with it, the problem is the compustar remote start. Got a Viper 4105 instead and worked perfectly with the DB3.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: A TOTAL RIP OFF
customer_reviews.text: This product is a problem. I had a mechanic install it(he is a professional lead mechanic at a major dealership in our area). After installing it he tried to program it, contacted computation and was told the unit had o be black market because they do not sell except through authorized dealers who have the ability to program. This was a TOTAL WASTE OF MONEY!!!! Amazon, you need to review this!!
customer_reviews.author: James Burnette

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts....
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I've been a Compustar dealer for years, installed this yesterday and the kit had no antenna or antenna wire, someone owes me some parts...luckily I had leftovers from spare parts from being a dealer, but someone needs to send me a replacement antenna & antenna wire for my troubles...I paid for them when I ordered the kit!
customer_reviews.author: SCOTTYZ Automotive Specialties

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but not great with range
customer_reviews.text: This was an easier install for me as I have a 99 wrangler that doesn't have all the features. I had to install just the power and a couple small wires for lights and brake output. However. It took me about two hours and I'm happy with the product. The only reason for 4 stars is that the range isn't the greatest. I think it needs a clear view for the full range. From my house it works but will not work across a full parking lot.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I installed this product on two trucks and they worked great. If you are not familiar with wiring diagrams I would recomend a professional. The only problem I had was one of the units was missing a hood pin switch witch is used to disable the unit if your working under the hood. Other than that great product would buy again but this time I will check to see that everything is there.
customer_reviews.author: Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My husband took it to a professional to have it installed. I'm not sure if it's easy to install or not, especially because he already had a remote start in his truck. Just needed an upgrade from previous model. He loves it though, especially the distance he can start his truck from.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn4814

customer_reviews.title: Great kit!
customer_reviews.text: installed in my wife's S10. I am fairly wiring savvy, so this kit went in easily. I downloaded the truck's schematics beforehand to be ready, and had a solid plan laid out early. I had upgraded the windows and locks from manual to power, so it was a bit more involved, but manageable. the only issue was the Passkey override, which YouTube showed me was as easy as installing a resistor in the key circuit to get the remote start to work.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie C.

customer_reviews.title: No one will install it
customer_reviews.text: So sad bought this for my son, for Christmas. He was ecstatic to get it. Took it around to best buy and toys for trucks. Who refused to install it because it's considered a out of date system. Said they install systems that are not bought from them but they have to be a up to date system. So pretty much useless for a person unless they are a electrician with the millions of wires. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: I installed this product in my 2003 f350 diesel and it's exceeded expectations by far. I had to get 2more relays for it to work properly in my vehicle but for a gasser it's ready to go. It works flawlessly and the range is amazing It's only been a week but I'm so impressed. Cannot beat it for the price and it's upgradable if you want other options. Would definitely buy again for another vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Miskiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.text: It's a great upgrade to the OEM system at a much lower cost compared to the OEM remote start system. You need to have a good background in doing installations of similar add ons on a vehicle. You really need to read the installation manual several times to understand what needs to be done and lessen the trial and error. Once you have it installed it's excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jgr105

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to install! Other parts needed!
customer_reviews.text: This item was not able to be installed without an experienced technition. Also needed an additional part. So in the end we ended up paying $250 more after the cost of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Legree

customer_reviews.title: good system for price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent system. Easy to install if you are handy with a soldering gun and have some wiring knowledge. Great for last winter season. Had some trouble setting the features but thats user lack of knowledge. Once figured out how to program, its super easy and makes the system even better to use. No hiccup. Range is not the best, but you are not paying premium either. I can remote start the car from inside my house and the car is the detach garage. For my application, the range is fine, hasnt fail me yet.. nice to have the car warmed during winter months before taking off.
customer_reviews.author: BrandonTL

customer_reviews.title: Not the range it says
customer_reviews.text: I loved the product easy straightforward to install the material feels exactly what you payed but it does the job...the only downside is that it specifies 1000ft range but barely even reaches 250
customer_reviews.author: jesus

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install if you have basic knowledge. Auto rearm flashes lights ever 10 seconds. Buttons on remote not recessed. When in your pocket you start car inadvertently. That being said mine was a simple one. I didn't have a factory system I had to disarm I'd recommend this
customer_reviews.author: az girl

customer_reviews.title: After getting wiring diagrams for both vehicles installation was easy. The range isn't great
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my Jeep and Wife's Toyota. The system is decent, the instructions were for professionals. After getting wiring diagrams for both vehicles installation was easy. The range isn't great, 100m line-of-sight and 20m with cars in between.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality and fast shipping to oman
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality and fast shipping to oman.But the module works only on automatic transmission. it didn't feet my car.
customer_reviews.author: khaled

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Winter is no longer a problem while having to park outside. And niether will summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Gall

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just was not aware that an interfacing was needed before they could be installed. This cost another $100
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Super simple to install Programming is a bit tricky with Compustar models without the programming device Upgrade able model that you can add on later down the road if you choose to
customer_reviews.author: D Vang

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would save some money and when I went to get it installed at two different places it would have cost me over 200 bucks in either place.
customer_reviews.author: Carmine

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK AT ALL FOR PURPOSE INTENED FOR
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT THIS PRODUCT IN AUGUST OF LAST YEAR 2019 FOR WINTER OF 2019 TO 2020 WORKED FINE IN WARM MONTHS BUT AS SOON AS IT GOT COLD OUT IT STOPED WORKING WOULD NOT START OR OPEN DOORS BECAUSE OF COLD . AND THE COLD IS THE REASON I BOUGHT THIS PRODUCT IM AM VERY VERY DISSAPOINTED IN PRODUCT FUNCTION AND CUSTOMER SERVICE BASICLY TOLD ME I BOUGHT IT SO ITS MY PROBLEM NOW DONT KNOW HOW AMAZON LETS THEM CONTINUE TO BASICLY CHEAT THIER LOYAL CUSTMERS
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Very poor - I WASTED MY MONEY
customer_reviews.text: It’s disgusting that I paid so much money to install this product and can’t get good service from it. I have to keep pressing the lock and unlock button at times, before getting a response. The sale goes for the starter. I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I can’t get it to work on my 2013 Chevy ...
customer_reviews.text: I can’t get it to work on my 2013 Chevy Truck because I have a chip in my key. I may have to take it to someone smarter than me.
customer_reviews.author: Big Will

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great for a 9 mouths now only complaint the instructions were very vague. The install is not for backyard mechanics get a good wiring schematics of your vehicle before installing
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Great system poor customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Poor customer service. You must know what you are doing. They won't answer your questions when you contact customer service. Highly recommended system.
customer_reviews.author: LEISA BARRETO

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Installed in both vehicles. Easy to follow instructions. Works flawlessly very hap I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua f.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a 29 year old Wagoneer that originally had power locks and now I have power lock, amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Installed in Jeep XJ
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a 2001 XJ (Cherokee). Took little time and easy to do. Works great and starts it every time.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Product sucks
customer_reviews.text: Well the first unit was delivered with missing parts no remotes and no antenna and the second was just installed and it does not work not happy with this product and the web site only gives you any help if you are a dealer. Really!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Mangels

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Would have been 5 stars if it wasnt missing the antenna wires. Package was sealed missing pieces. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Easy to install as long as you have a wiring diagram for your vehicle. Very affordable. Only bad thing is if you keep the remote in your pocket you can start your vehicle accidentally.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ryan Wickman

customer_reviews.title: Call your mechanic first
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews on this product on Amazon and elsewhere. Overall, the ratings/comments this starter were good-in value and performance. However, after purchasing this, no auto mechanic in our area would install it (you have to buy one from them specifically).
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: More information would be helpful.
customer_reviews.text: Got what I paid for. Good product. Wish more product info was available, I worked have purchased an interface module as well and made life a whole lot easier. Still would if I could find the info needed
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hidey

customer_reviews.title: at least two times car started by itself without me ...
customer_reviews.text: at least two times car started by itself without me pressing any buttons. Now perhaps something was pressing against "start" button while key fob were in my pocket but car security was still in place. Just a little bit concerning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Probably better to have a shop install it
customer_reviews.text: It was kindof easy to instal but the instruction manual on how to program different settings wasnt descriptive enough and I couldn’t program anything then when I called compustar they told me they couldn’t tell me since I did it myself
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Montero

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I put this remote start system on a 1999 jeep Cherokee and it works like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: mario

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bad instructions. Very confusing. Got starter to work but not locks and trunk
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Better unit for older cars
customer_reviews.text: This remote start needs additional components in order to work with cars made in the last 10 years or so. This remote start would be more suited for an older, non-computerized car.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were really clear. It works perfect everytime and it was easy to install. I love the diesel timer for my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Mason S.

customer_reviews.title: Beware installation costs
customer_reviews.text: The finished product works great, but it cost about $250 for installation.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and easy installation. lot of options to customize to different ...
customer_reviews.text: Reliable and easy installation.lot of options to customize to different vehicle configuration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra money
customer_reviews.text: It’s way to complicated to install and is still sitting in a box at my house after trying to put it in a Toyota truck
customer_reviews.author: Shelia hansen

customer_reviews.title: Easiest remote starter to install on the market!!!
customer_reviews.text: Never installed one before and got it on my first try, I'm 19 and this was a piece of cake! It runs for 15 minutes and if you get in turn your key 2 clicks it will continue running without turning off!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUY IF YOU KNOW HOW TO INSTALL
customer_reviews.text: I DID NOT KNOW HOW TO INSTALL THIS ON MY OWN AND MOST SHOPS WONT INSTALL FROM THIRD PARTY... THEY USUALLY ONLY INSTALL KEYFOBS THEY SELL...
customer_reviews.author: DARREN

customer_reviews.title: Installation.
customer_reviews.text: I could not find anyone to put this in. I was told that only dealerships will put them in a newer vehicle and use their own equipment. So I returned this item. Very frustrated.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt fit honda fit 2010
customer_reviews.text: Bought this. Fast delivery with nice packaging. Went to Geek squad for installation and was told that its not compatible with my honda fit 2010.
customer_reviews.author: Plaincircle

customer_reviews.title: CS800-S remote start
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Included instruction booklet is a bit small to read . Good range of operation.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Remote start my 1952 chevy pickup
customer_reviews.text: Installed compustar cs800s remote start on my 1952 chevy pick up at first i was intimidated by all those wires but the installation book that came with it made it real easy to understand and install
customer_reviews.author: David Luna

customer_reviews.title: After installed it worked great. Wifey was happy
customer_reviews.text: Do not attempt to install yourself. Has to be done by certified installer who only has access to 'program' it. Do not forget to purchase the ID at a link as well. After installed it worked great. Wifey was happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brezinbyu

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent car starter,if your mechanically inclined you will have no problems installing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Outdated model and cannot find an installer to install product. Bad sell!!!
customer_reviews.author: A.E. not satisfied

customer_reviews.title: Great budget  product
customer_reviews.text: It was relatively easy to install. And it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Mbrubaker1

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Jeeps so we can warm up them before we go to work Nice!!!
customer_reviews.author: forest sidelinger

customer_reviews.title: Easy install on my 2007 Subaru impreza
customer_reviews.text: Easy install on my 2007 Subaru impreza. My advice is to run with the tach sensor since I couldn't get it to run tachless on my subie. Search your car forums for wiring details there are some awesome people out there that make write ups for diyers like myself Update: Not sure if the range is actually 1000 ft. Feels like its maybe about 500 ft. Anyways everything is working as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price. No complaints whatsoever. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: K Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good price and works good. Great distance, about 300-400 feet so far. Haven't tried any further yet.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Bitner

customer_reviews.title: Wont work on 2000 f150 even with the bypass
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the product. Didn't work for my vehicle
customer_reviews.author: bruce perry

customer_reviews.title: idem has been discontinued
customer_reviews.text: wont work on newer cars with pass code 111 on it
customer_reviews.author: Gary Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great for experienced DIYers. No real instructions.
customer_reviews.text: Must be experienced to install this. Works great. Nice features. Easy to handle FOB.
customer_reviews.author: James Ham

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great remote starter, especially for the price. Fairly easy to install. Hard time programming the options/features.
customer_reviews.author: Carguy50

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and as described. Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my 1992 Jeep Cherokee to replace a worn out Bulldog system. Installation was a breeze. Had to re-use the Bulldog relays for my positive activated door locks but not a problem. You vehicle may need the lock kit so order that if you need it. Fast shipping. Been FANTASTIC for those -20F mornings!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works great. i park my truck 60 yards away on ...
customer_reviews.text: had this remote start installed thursday by company in town. It works great. i park my truck 60 yards away on the other side of a metal building and the remote start works with no problem. I will warn you though, I DID NOT RECIEVE ANY HELP from Compustar about product install. I had to find an installer in town to put it in. it was impossible to find a good wiring diagram for my truck in order to do it myself. other than that and the extra cost of the install it works great.
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a breeze to install and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: BLY

customer_reviews.title: The system works ok, but uses a negative trigger ...
customer_reviews.text: The system works ok, but uses a negative trigger for the door locks and doesn't contain a security bypass module.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Great Remote Starter!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Bought 2 of them, great range, easy install.
customer_reviews.author: alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far so good range is good and very reliable as of yet
customer_reviews.author: brian cohen

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the unit itself and with the installer
customer_reviews.text: So far this remote starter hasn't failed.Very happy with the unit itself and with the installer. Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: Good instructions are included which makes the instal straight forward and easy if you have some knowledge of automotive wiring. It works well but the range might not be 1000'. Overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy install for someone who has a moderate understanding of automotive electrical systems. Installed on a 1997 eagle talon
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: great and easy
customer_reviews.text: Thanks for such an easy kit hooked it up within a hour... first install ever on a remote start... 05 cavalier
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be working pretty good I just installed it but it's working
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More Info Please!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew a bit more info when I bought this. First of all just to make it clear you NEED a BYPASS MODULE! the one that is recommenced when checking out is a good one to get. Second you NEED BOTH of you KEYS for your car! I went to Best Buy to have them install it and they told me (after an hr of waiting) I need both keys! so the whole total of the buy and install came to about $400! but it is worth it if you have the money!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly as advertised. I did a self install with help of Haynes manual and multimeter.
customer_reviews.author: jarrod b gibson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Cost over 250 to get extra parts and have it installed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy installation. 94 Bronco. The hood open safety switch doesn't work for some reason. I used relays for door locks. Used a relay to drop my rear window with trunk button....only issue is that the max pulse when pushing the trunk button is 3 seconds. I wish it was a continuous signal until you let go. It takes about 7 seconds to drop the rear window.....I have to push truck button 3x.
customer_reviews.author: Ibuytoo Much

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware. NO WARRANTY.
customer_reviews.text: CompuStar doesn't allow online sales and will void the warranty on any product purchased online. Be nice to know this before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Aquino

customer_reviews.title: Hi
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas present for my wife have not looked it up yet going to be a little bit before we can but happy with the price and delivery time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot except the control in a pants ...
customer_reviews.text: Like it a lot except the control in a pants pocket is too easy to activate the functions. Within the first two weeks I came out to my car with the doors unlocked and truck open twice and once the engine was running.
customer_reviews.author: jerrellg

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your time!
customer_reviews.text: This item says it comes with a bypass module it does not. My item actually is even missing a cable required to hook it up. I needed this before christmas what a waste of my time!!
customer_reviews.author: Dylan N.

customer_reviews.title: ... was a gift so I don't know how they like it yet
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift so I don't know how they like it yet!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Barton

customer_reviews.title: I, had two compustar remotes. They don't work ...
customer_reviews.text: I, had two compustar remotes. They don't work. Only the parking lights worked. This was my first time with compustar. I've install others before this .
customer_reviews.author: Tony H.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Worst product i ever bought from amazon I Could never get the system to work even by using the instructions
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: If you're not a mechanic....
customer_reviews.text: The item cost $50. and was going to cost over $300. to have it installed with all the labor involved. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: however this exact model on Best Buy's site includes the bypass
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with a bypass, however this exact model on Best Buy's site includes the bypass. Ended up having to pay $70 extra to ship a bypass in order to then install.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: junk wast of money need to add relays to use power door locks on a gm
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: If you are knowledgeable about stereos and alarm i
customer_reviews.text: Product appears well designed. Installation instructions are ok. One remote had a dead battery right out of the box
customer_reviews.author: Dean Spiker

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on my 2006 Saturn Vue and with the Idatalink ACLA databus
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my 2006 Saturn Vue. I used the idatalink ALCA databus with this Compustar CS800-S remote start system and it works with no problem. All the connections to my ignition switch were fairly easy to get to and I soldered them all and double taped them too. Took me about 4 hours to install it because I triple checked every connection via the paper instructions and on the internet at their websites. I took my time because I did not want to short anything out. If I did it again It would be half the time.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mama

customer_reviews.title: Poor support when purchased on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this item to install on a 2007 Mercury Milan. It worked great for a little while and then it started starting on its own and flashing the Park lights. I contacted tech support with them to discuss this problem and they told me that Amazon is not an authorized dealer. The best thing to do was refer me to text support. I have been a Ford technician for 20 years plus and do know what I'm doing. The lack of support for this product purchase an Amazon makes me want to give it less than one star.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Nice produuct,if it worked
customer_reviews.text: Should have read the information on Compustars websight first...This product carries no warranty if not installed by a Compustar recommended installer. After 40 years of automotive knowledge I had no installation suppost because I am not one of their installers. Trust me folks this thing did not work. Bad module...Sent it back and purchased another brand and had it installed in an hour. I wouldnt expect install time for a novice to go beyond 4 hours on the new one i bought.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Not too difficult
customer_reviews.text: There's enough info online to figure out the install on this device. A few of the wire colors might not be obvious but with some trial and error you'll have the starter working. If you can wire a car radio, you can do this no problem. I installed this on a Jeep Cherokee XJ. Required me to connect at least one wire under the hood for the tachometer reading.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Very poor instructions. Very poor.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions that came with this do a very poor job of explaining how to install and their website isn't of any help either. I installed a different brand of remote starter a few years ago and although it wasn't the easiest thing to do, I remember that one came with detailed instructions for my vehicle and I was able to do it. Most of the Youtube videos said do not attempt unless you really know what you are doing. I don't feel confident that I can do this and since I had to wait until the weather warmed up, it's too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Markymark

customer_reviews.title: INSTALLATION IS NOT EASY
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe anyone would say this is “easy” to install. Easy means most anyone can install regardless of know how. The directions are terrible and the wiring knowledge needed is NOT something most people have. I’ve never installed anything like this and had no idea where to even begin. Unscrewing the panel below the steering wheel and figuring out what wire goes where isn’t “easy”. Setting a blue ray player is easy, this is a mess. If you’re not savvy & experienced in auto-wiring DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Niki A.

customer_reviews.title: all is good.
customer_reviews.text: installed by pro , saved money and so far works well , just hooked up basic items , lock unlock , start stop and light confirm in my 2001 ram sport. all is good .
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Basinski

customer_reviews.title: I recently bought a truck with this system installed on ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought a truck with this system installed on it, but only one remote. I gave it 4 stars because you can't buy just a single remote, but programming was a piece of cake and I haven't had any issues with the system whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: David Patton

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work in cold weather
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product along with required “Universal Remote Start Interface w/selectable key windings (Working ignition key required for selected vehicles)” Product works great at temperatures over 35 degrees. Fails miserably as soon as it gets colder. Completely useless for winter
customer_reviews.author: D Beard

customer_reviews.title: Easy install
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a a gift for my son's birthday, and had the basic start function up and running in about 2 hours. I should mention I'm an electrician but honestly on the 01 Subaru Outback VDC is was about as easy as it gets. Range exceeds the specs..Goodluck T3
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read installation guide
customer_reviews.text: I will update my review after it is installed, but as for now, the instructions seem very simplistic and easy to understand. My husband has experience working under the hood so it shouldn’t be difficult to install.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Gilliard

product_meta.title: Compustar CS800-S 1-Way Remote Start with 2 4-Button Remotes 1000 Feet Range CS800S CS800
product_meta.description:
Up to 1000-Ft of Range - Powered by Amplitude Modulation (AM). Send commands from up to 1000 feet away
Remote Start - Hold down the KEY button for 2.5 seconds to remotely start your engine to heat up/cool down your vehicle.
Keyless Entry - Press the LOCK or UNLOCK buttons to remotely lock and unlock your vehicle's doors from extended distance.
Trunk Release - Hold the TRUNK icon to pop your trunk or to activate your power liftgate.
Diesel-Engine Ready - This remote starter can be safely installed onto a diesel-engine vehicle.
DroneMobile Ready - Pair this system with a DR-3400 to add smartphone control and GPS tracking.
Vehicle specific bypass module sold separately.
feature_bullets: 1-Way Remote Start System with Keyless Entry
